DOC.HEADLINE: ORANGE COUNTY FOCUS : ANAHEIM ; STATE DESIGNATES RECYCLING ZONE
DOC.TEXT: The state Integrated Waste Management Board recently designated Anaheim Canyon Business Center as a recycling market development zone . The designation entitles businesses within the 2 # 400-acre area to low-interest loans and other state assistance . The businesses manufacture products from recycled materials such_as glass , plastic and paper . The business center contains the largest material-recovery facility by volume in the Western United States .
